resources.string: Little Treasure Hunter
NEW ROUTE
The hint has been recorded
Hint recording failed
Enter route name:
Stop the recording
Close
"Are you sure you want to delete the %1$s route?"
Latitude:
Longitude:
Route
Add a route to start the game
The photo is being saved ...
The photo has not been saved
Error saving the photo
"A route with that name already exists, do you want to overwrite it? "
"There is already a hint, do you want to overwrite it? "
"A photo has already been taken, do you want to overwrite it? "
GET A ROUTE VIA BLUETOOTH
Sending a route
%s was selected.
Trying to connect with %s.
Bluetooth is not available.
No phone was found. Try pairing via Bluetooth the phone to which you want to send the route and restart the route sending.
Bluetooth is turned off. Try turning it on and retry sending route.
Route %s received.
File %s received.
All route files have been received. You can go back to the main screen.
Bluetooth adapter not detected. The device cannot receive routes.
A technical error occurred while accepting the connection via Bluetooth: %s
Incoming Bluetooth connection has been accepted.
Waiting for communication - you should start sending the route from another, connected via Bluetooth device.
A technical error occurred while establishing a connection via Bluetooth: %
Bluetooth connection has been established.
A route has been sent via Bluetooth
There was a technical error while sending the route: %s
One device that can be sent a route has been detected (shown at the bottom of the screen).
Bluetooth route sending. It may take several minutes ... Please wait for the message that the transmission is completed.
Waiting for transmission of the next file...
A technical error occurred while establishing a connection: %s
Return to permissions
Not all permissions used by the application have been granted. Do you want to go back to granting permissions?
Cancel
Missing permission
Settings
Permissions are needed to prepare hints in the form of photos and sound recordings.
The operation is not allowed
The permission to access Bluetooth is needed to transfer routes between devices.
"> Select the device to which you want to send the route. Sending will only be successful if there is an active connection to the selected device.\n > List of paired devices: \n"
The treasure [%s] was marked as collected.
The GPS did not let to identify which treasure was found. Mark it manually.
Sharing was cancelled
Shared
Please select the route you would like to share
It is not possible to share this route
There is currently nothing to share. You can only share routes where the searching has already begun.
External storage permission is required for exporting game progress into an image.
https://little-treasure-hunter.netlify.app/#/README_en
To record hints, allow microphone access.
Location unavailable
The last treasure cannot be removed
Not all permissions required for Bluetooth transfer were granted.
mission in
Kalinowice
